This module is a part of SomConnexió original module.

We are working to separate the monolithic original module in small
modules splited by functionalities.

This module add the customizations of Som Connexió over the
contract_group module.

Add a wizard to perform the contract group change in a contract. Add the
"TO REVIEW" group for special cases. Customize the method to get the
contract group with the Som Connexió logic, get the first group that
match with emails_ids and bank account number.

 Configuration
***************

No configuration is required for this module.
